content: {"locationId": "1241", "organizationId": "1090", "name": "Pecatonica Community Food Pantry", "address1": "527 Main Street", "address2": "", "city": "Pecatonica", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "61063", "country": null, "phone": "815-335-7143", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "42.3119527", "longitude": "-89.3597596", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "We are located at the corner of 5th Street and Main Street in Pecatonica, Illinois.", "notes": "We are currently offering a drive through distribution.  All clients are asked to park on 5th Street facing east.  All food is prepacked and loaded into the vehicle on a first come, first served basis.      WE ARE CLOSED ON TUESDAY, DECEMBER 24, 2024.          WE WILL BE OPEN ON  SATURDAY, DECEMBER 28, 2024 , FROM 10-11:30 AM.", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "815-335-7143", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 2, "regionName": "Northern Illinois Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "dbf64577-4f05-4753-a6ec-ebbbd9c99e9c.png", "website": "solvehungertoday.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 10:00 AM-11:30 AM [ 4th week(s)]", "Wednesday 3:00 PM-4:30 PM [ 3rd week(s)]", "Saturday 10:00 AM-11:30 AM [ 2nd week(s)]"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
